amendment.description: To make $21,900,000 available for M1A1 Tank transmission maintenance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3505 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3505 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S7375; text: CR S7375) To make $21,900,000 available for M1A1 Tank transmission maintenance.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3505 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3505 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bayh.
